title: Detecting AI-Generated Images: A Survey
abstract: Comprehensive survey of state-of-the-art methods for detecting AI-generated images, covering GANs, diffusion models, and transformer-based approaches.

title: GPTZero: Towards Detection of AI-Generated Text
abstract: Novel approach to detecting AI-generated text using perplexity and burstiness metrics.

title: DeepFake Detection: A Systematic Review
abstract: Systematic review of deepfake detection methods, challenges, and future directions in video manipulation detection.

title: Fighting Deepfakes with Blockchain
abstract: Exploring blockchain-based solutions for verifying content authenticity and combating deepfakes.

title: Large Language Models and AI Text Detection
abstract: Analysis of detection methods for identifying text generated by large language models like GPT-4.

title: Generative AI: A Comprehensive Review
abstract: Comprehensive review of generative AI technologies and their societal implications, including detection challenges.
